name: Email Customizer for WooCommerce – Customize WooCommerce Emails with Spark Editor
author: emaileditorplus

sections.faq:
How to customize WooCommerce emails ?

Install the Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce and customize the email templates using the visual drag and drop email editor.

How to edit WooCommerce emails ?

Install the Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce and edit the email templates using the visual drag and drop email editor.

How to add logo to WooCommerce order emails ?

Install the Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce and edit the order confirmation email template. You will see a drag and drop email builder. Drag the image element into the template and choose your logo. This will add logo to your WooCommerce order confirmation emails

Can I use Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce with any WordPress theme?

Yes, Spark is compatible with all WordPress themes. It works seamlessly with popular themes like Astra, Divi, and OceanWP.

Do I need coding skills to customize emails with Spark?

Not at all! Spark features a drag-and-drop builder and a user-friendly interface that allows you to customize emails visually.

Can I send a test email before going live?

Yes, you can send test emails to see how your customized emails will look in your customers’ inboxes.

Does Spark support multiple languages?

Yes, Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce is compatible with WPML, enabling you to create email templates in different languages.
sections.description:
Customize WooCommerce emails with an easy-to-use drag and drop email builder. Use readymade templates, preview emails & send test emails

Best Email Customizer for WooCommerce. Customize WooCommerce Emails with drag and drop email builder

Create stunning, on-brand WooCommerce emails without writing a single line of code. With Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce, you get a powerful drag-and-drop WooCommerce email template editor, a visual design interface. Customize every detail of your store’s emails—add order details, customer address, personalize emails with short codes, change logo and dynamic WooCommerce elements—using intuitive editor with real-time previews.

Built for speed and flexibility, Spark lets you design responsive email templates that look great on any device. Whether you’re a designer refining a brand’s look or a developer building custom solutions, Spark gives you complete control over your WooCommerce email experience—no coding needed.

Get PRO | View Admin Demo | Documentation | Video Tutorials

Why Use Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce?

Emails are the lifeline of eCommerce communication, whether it’s order confirmations, shipping notifications, or customer account emails. Yet, default WooCommerce email notifications can often feel plain and lack that personalized touch that helps build a brand. Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce changes this, providing a suite of tools to customize WooCommerce emails and deliver a seamless, branded experience for your customers.

Spark Editor is designed to help you create beautiful, branded emails that can elevate customer experiences and increase engagement. Whether you’re a small store or a large eCommerce business, Spark gives you the flexibility to create custom WooCommerce email templates without the need for complex HTML.

Key Features of Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce

The free version of the Spark WooCommerce Email designer allows you to customize the default WooCommerce emails.

  • Drag-and-Drop Builder: Our WooCommerce custom email builder allows you to create your custom email templates with a simple drag-and-drop interface. Add elements like images, logos, social media icons, buttons, and more without touching a line of code.
  • Custom WooCommerce Email Templates: Customize the entire WooCommerce email template. You can drag and drop elements like texts, images, buttons, social media links and more
  • Preview Email Templates: See changes using a sample or an exiting order data as you customize your email templates. This feature ensures that your custom email notifications look perfect before they reach your customers’ inboxes.
  • Support for default WooCommerce Email Templates: Design templates for all default WooCommerce emails, including Order Confirmation, Shipping Notification, New Account, Password Reset, and more.
  • Responsive Design: Spark ensures that your responsive email templates look great on any device, from desktop to mobile, making sure your brand shines no matter how customers read your messages.
  • Pre-Built Template: Get started quickly with professionally designed template that can be customized to match your branding.
  • Dynamic WooCommerce Elements: Easily add WooCommerce-specific elements like order details, billing addresses, shipping addresses, order metadata, payment info and product information directly into your email templates using short codes
  • Advanced Styling Options: Tweak colors, backgrounds, and more to create visually appealing emails that are consistent with your brand identity.
  • Shortcodes Support: Use shortcodes to include dynamic customer information, such as customer names, order numbers, order statuses, order metadata and more.
  • Test Email Functionality: Send test emails to preview your custom designs before they go live, ensuring accuracy and design perfection.

Customizable WooCommerce Email Templates

With Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce, you can customize WooCommerce email templates to align with your store’s tone and branding. Below is a list of all the 11 WooCommerce emails that can be tailored using the free version:

  • New Order Email: Notify store admins with a customized new order email template.
  • Canceled Order Email: Send personalized emails to inform store admins of order cancellations.
  • Failed Order Email: Notify customers when their orders fail with a professionally branded message.
  • Order On-Hold Email: Customize the on-hold email for orders awaiting further action.
  • Order Processing Email: Personalize the emails sent to customers when their orders are being processed.
  • Order Completed Email: Deliver a warm, branded confirmation message when an order is marked as completed.
  • Order Refunded Email: Customize the message sent when an order is refunded.
  • Customer Invoice Email: Send invoices to customers with a branded touch, including order details and payment links.
  • Customer Note Email: Add a custom touch when sending notes or updates to customers regarding their orders.
  • Reset Password Email: Create a secure yet welcoming reset password email for customers.
  • New Account Email: Greet new customers with a branded welcome message when they create an account on your website.

Get PRO | View Admin Demo | Documentation | Video Tutorials

How Does Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce Work?

Getting started is easy! Follow these simple steps to set up your customized emails:

  1. Install and Activate: Install Spark Email Customizer for WooCommerce through the WordPress plugins directory or upload the plugin manually. Activate it from the “Plugins” page.
  2. Navigate to Email Customizer: Find the customizer under the WooCommerce menu in your WordPress dashboard. Click on it to start designing.
  3. Choose a Template: Select which WooCommerce email template you want to customize. Use the drag-and-drop email builder to add, remove, or rearrange elements.
  4. Style Your Template: Use the intuitive styling options to adjust colors, fonts, spacing, and more.
  5. Preview and Test: Use the live preview to see how your emails will look on desktop and mobile. Send test emails to ensure everything looks great.
  6. Save and Apply: Once satisfied, save your changes. Your customized emails will automatically replace the default WooCommerce email templates.

Need more than the basic elements? Try Spark Email Customizer PRO that comes with more features and integrations for a number of WooCommerce plugins

Get PRO | View Admin Demo | Documentation | Video Tutorials

Spark Email Customizer PRO

Tired of struggling with rigid email templates that don’t align with your brand? Spark Email Customizer PRO is here to solve that. It’s designed for those who want to elevate their WooCommerce email game—without diving into code.

WooCommerce Subscriptions: Say goodbye to generic subscription emails. With Spark PRO, you can customize every message your subscribers receive. No coding required—just a seamless experience that makes sure every touchpoint aligns with your brand.

WooCommerce Bookings: Booking emails should reflect the same professionalism as your services. Spark PRO makes it easy to tailor every booking confirmation, reminder, and follow-up email, ensuring that your customers feel valued from the moment they book.

WPLoyalty: Keep your loyalty program communication on-brand. With Spark PRO, you can tweak all emails sent through WPLoyalty, making sure your customers receive polished, personalized messages that keep them coming back.

Save Time with Reusable Content Blocks

Speed up your workflow with Saved Blocks. Create reusable sections of email content—think headers, footers, and promotional messages—that can be applied across multiple email templates. No more repetitive work, just consistent branding and faster email customization.

Spark Email Editor PRO helps you focus on what matters: creating emails that engage, retain, and convert—without the technical hassle.

Get PRO | View Admin Demo | Documentation | Video Tutorials

Support

Need help in customizing email templates in your WooCommerce store? Contact our support team and get answers to all your queries. Just create a ticket on our support page.
